bugreport.Bug: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user
bugreport.Status: New/Open/Active (Depends on the Tool you are using)
bugreport.Steps:
<1>Login into the Application</1> <2>Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User</2> <3>Filled out all the user information fields</3> <4>Clicked on the ‘Save’ button</4> <5>Seen an error page “ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error…”</5>
On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message “New User has been created successfully” Seen an error page “ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error screenshots, videos, text
